TestCase.Direction: Launch -> Access Area Group -> Select Access Area Group -> Network Event Analysis -> Core PS

RepeatValidation.SqlTest: Select count(*) as 'sqlFailures', count(distinct(imsi)) as 'sqlImpacted' from EVENT_E_LTE_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{-master-accessareagroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat and event_id = {eventId} and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')

Select sum(no_of_successes) as 'sqlSuccess' from event_e_lte_vend_hier321_eventid_suc_15min aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{-master-accessareagroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat and event_id = {eventId} and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00'

select tac as 'sqlTac', event_source_name as 'sqlEventSourceName', rat as 'sqlRatID', hierarchy_3 as 'sqlHierarchyThree', hierarchy_1 as 'sqlHierarchyOne', event_id as 'sqlEventID', vendor as 'sqlVendor' from event_e_lte_err_raw where imsi = {imsi} and event_time = '{eventTime}' and cause_code = {causeCodeID} and subcause_code = {subCauseCodeID} and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and apn='{apn}' and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00'
RepeatValidation.Validate: tac = sqlTac,SGSNMME = sqlEventSourceName,ratID = sqlRatID,controller = sqlHierarchyThree,accessArea = sqlHierarchyOne,1.eventId = sqlEventID,vendor = sqlVendor

RepeatValidation.SqlTest: Select count(*) as 'sqlFailures', count(distinct(imsi)) as 'sqlImpacted' from event_e_lte_err_raw where hierarchy_1 in (select hierarchy_1 from GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 where group_name = '{-master-accessarea-group-}') and hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and event_id = {eventId} and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and vendor = '{vendor}' and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')

declare @hier321Id unsigned bigint declare @hier3Id unsigned bigint SELECT @hier321Id = (select top 1 hier321_id FROM dim_e_sgeh_hier321 WHERE vendor = '{vendor}' AND hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' AND hierarchy_3 = '{controller}') SELECT @hier3Id = (select top 1 hier3_id FROM dim_e_sgeh_hier321 WHERE vendor = '{vendor}' AND hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' AND hierarchy_3 = '{controller}') if @hier321Id is null select @hier321Id = convert(bigint,'{accessArea}') IF @hier3Id IS NULL SELECT @hier3Id = CONVERT(BIGINT,'{controller}') Select sum(no_of_successes) as 'sqlSuccess' from event_e_sgeh_imsi_suc_raw where event_id = {eventId} and hier321_id in (select @hier321Id) and @hier3Id in (select @hier3Id) and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')

Select count(*) as 'sqlSuccess' from event_e_sgeh_suc_raw where event_id = {eventId} and vendor = '{vendor}' AND hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' AND hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')

Select count(*) as 'sqlFailures', count(distinct(imsi)) as 'sqlImpacted' from event_e_lte_err_raw where hierarchy_1 = '{accessArea}' and event_id = {eventId} and hierarchy_3 = '{controller}' and vendor = '{vendor}' and cause_code = {causeCodeId} and subcause_code = {subcauseCodeId} and cause_prot_type = {causeProtId} and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') and rat = {ratId}

select tac as 'sqlTac', event_source_name as 'sqlEventSourceName', rat as 'sqlRatID', hierarchy_3 as 'sqlHierarchyThree', hierarchy_1 as 'sqlHierarchyOne', event_id as 'sqlEventID', vendor as 'sqlVendor' from event_e_lte_err_raw where imsi = {imsi} and event_time = '{eventTime}' and cause_code = {3.causeCodeId} and subcause_code = {3.subcauseCodeId} and hierarchy_1 = '{3.accessArea}' and hierarchy_3 = '{3.controller}' and event_id = {3.eventId} and DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' and tac not in (select tac from group_type_e_tac where group_name = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')
RepeatValidation.Validate: tac = sqlTac,sgsnMme = sqlEventSourceName,ratId = sqlRatID,controller = sqlHierarchyThree,accessArea = sqlHierarchyOne,3.eventId = sqlEventID,vendor = sqlVendor

RepeatValidation.SqlTest: SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlAttachSuccessRate' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 0 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 0 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextActivationSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 1 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlRAUpdateSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 2 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 2 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlInterSGSNMMERAUpdateSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 3 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 3 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100*ISNULL(CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT),0),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCutoffRatio' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT, ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_NET_INIT_DEACTIVATES),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 4 ) AS suc, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlDetachSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 14 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 14 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(ERR_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlServiceRequestFR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 15 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 15 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(ERR_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPagingFR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(PAGING_ATTEMPTS),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 15 AND PAGING_ATTEMPTS > 0 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_PAGING_ATTEMPTS),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 15 AND NO_OF_PAGING_ATTEMPTS > 0 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(CAST(ERR_PAGING_ATTEMPTS AS DECIMAL(16))/ERR_UNIQUE_SUBSCRIBERS,2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPagingAttemptsPerSub' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT IMSI),0) AS ERR_UNIQUE_SUBSCRIBERS, ISNULL(SUM(PAGING_ATTEMPTS),0) AS ERR_PAGING_ATTEMPTS FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT IMSI) AS 'sqlImpactedSubscribers' FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlAttachSuccessRateLTE' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 5 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 5 ) AS suc

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlPDNConnectionSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 11 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 11 ) AS suc

SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT IMSI),0) AS 'sqlImpactedSubscribersLTE' FROM EVENT_E_LTE_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')

SELECT CAST(ROUND(100 *(CAST(SUC_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(ERR_COUNT + SUC_COUNT)),2) AS NUMERIC(18,2)) AS 'sqlBearerActivationSR' FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS ERR_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_ERR_RAW rawtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and rawtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and rawtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and rawtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and rawtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 9 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC') ) AS err, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS SUC_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_LTE_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN aggtable, GROUP_TYPE_E_RAT_VEND_HIER321 grouptable where grouptable.group_name = '{1.accessAreaGroup}' and aggtable.hierarchy_1 = grouptable.hierarchy_1 and aggtable.hierarchy_3 = grouptable.hierarchy_3 and aggtable.vendor = grouptable.vendor and aggtable.rat = grouptable.rat AND {kpiTime} AND EVENT_ID = 9 ) AS suc
